DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective study compare clinical radiographic outcome standard high-flexion posterior stabilize ( PS ) rotating-platform mobile-bearing ( RP-MB ) total knee arthroplasty . The investigator hypothesize total knee arthroplasty perform high-flexion PS RP-MB design would improve range motion , would reflect good clinical outcome great patient satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes After Standard High-Flexion Posterior Stabilized Rotating-Platform Mobile-Bearing Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: A high-flexion , PS RP-MB prosthesis design improve range motion total knee arthroplasty without compromise theoretical advantage standard PS RP-MB system . To date , study prospectively compare clinical radiographic result standard high-flexion PS RP-MB design .
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis primary osteoarthritis knee A candidate total knee replacement arthroplasty A diagnosis primary osteoarthritis A history previous open knee surgery
